name: FuelTrak
short_description:
FuelTrak has come about by my need to economise on the fuel I use while driving.  This is especially true during my daily commute of about 35 miles each way.

It may come as a surprise to some outside the UK (particularly in the USA), but the average price for diesel fuel here is around £1.38.9 per litre or often more.  Petrol (gasoline) is slightly cheaper, but only by a few pence, and of course gets you nowhere near the milage.  

At current rates, this works out at nearly USD $8.50 per gallon.  So as you can see, keeping track of my spending might just save me money!
summary: Tracks money spent on fuel, as well as milage achieved.
